name: Car Parking Multiplayer
description:
Car Parking Multiplayer, not only about parking:

*86 Parking Levels with unique environment, car and real life challenges;
*60+ Cars with detailed interior
*Free Walking
*Car tunings
*Car Vinyls
*Free Drive Mode
*MultiPlayer Free Drive Mode
*MultiPlayer Racing
*Exchange car with friend
*Chat
*Friend List
*Big Environment (Desert, Highway, City, Village)
*Home with Interior and dog :)
*Voice Chat
*Police Mode

Thousands of players are waiting for you.
Join us!
